description:
computeDigestForDai(bytes32,bytes32,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- HashHelper.computeDigestForDai(bytes32,bytes32,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256) (contracts/specs/HashHelper.sol#6-28)

call_ecrecover(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) should be declared external:
	- HashHelper.call_ecrecover(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (contracts/specs/HashHelper.sol#30-37)
DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) ignores return value by dai.transfer(alice,wad) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#63)
DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) ignores return value by dai.transferFrom(alice,address(this),wad) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#73)

DaiEchidnaTest.burn(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#49-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == sub(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#54)

DaiEchidnaTest.burn(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#49-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- aliceBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#52)

DaiEchidnaTest.mint(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#39-46) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == add(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#44)

DaiEchidnaTest.transfer(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#59-66) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == add(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#65)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(alice) == sub(aliceBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#74)

DaiEchidnaTest.transferFrom(uint256) (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#69-76) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- aliceBalance == 0 (contracts/test/DaiEchidnaTest.sol#72)

L1DAITokenBridge._initiateERC20Deposit(address,address,uint256,uint32,bytes) (contracts/l1/L1DAITokenBridge.sol#108-126) ignores return value by TokenLike(l1Token).transferFrom(_from,escrow,_amount) (contracts/l1/L1DAITokenBridge.sol#118)

L1DAITokenBridge.finalizeERC20Withdrawal(address,address,address,address,uint256,bytes) (contracts/l1/L1DAITokenBridge.sol#128-141) ignores return value by TokenLike(l1Token).transferFrom(escrow,_to,_amount) (contracts/l1/L1DAITokenBridge.sol#138)

Reentrancy in L2DAITokenBridge.finalizeDeposit(address,address,address,address,uint256,bytes) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#130-147):
	External calls:
	- Mintable(l2Token).mint(_to,_amount) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#144)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- DepositFinalized(_l1Token,_l2Token,_from,_to,_amount,_data) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#146)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [L2DAITokenBridge.finalizeDeposit(address,address,address,address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L130-L147):
	External calls:
	- [Mintable(l2Token).mint(_to,_amount)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L144)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [DepositFinalized(_l1Token,_l2Token,_from,_to,_amount,_data)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L146)

description:
Dai.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (contracts/l2/dai.sol#184-208) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp <= deadline,Dai/permit-expired) (contracts/l2/dai.sol#185)
markdown:
